title: Intl Chars How-To
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [How-To](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/How-To) : Drawing International Characters**

**Specifics on Diacritics:**  
 [Ogonek](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Ogonek)

See also [Characters](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Characters).

**On-line Resources**  
 [Character design standards @ Microsoft](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/developers/fdsspec/default.htm)  
 [Data on Languages @ Institut of Esthonian Language](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.eki.ee/letter)  
 [Diacritics Project. All you need to design a font with correct accents](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/diacritics.typo.cz/)  
 [Gaultney, J. Victor: Problems of diacritic design for Latin script text faces, 2002](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.sil.org/~gaultney/research.html)  
 [Polish Diacritics How To?](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.twardoch.com/download/polishhowto/index.html)  
 [Thorn and eth: how to get them right](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/briem.ismennt.is/)  
 [Wells, J.C.: Orthographic diacritics and multilingual computing](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.phon.ucl.ac.uk/home/wells/dia/diacritics-revised.htm)  
 [Context of Diacritics](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/urtd.net/projects/cod/) by [Ondrej Jób](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/about.me/ondrejjob)  
 [On Diacritics](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/ilovetypography.com/2009/01/24/on-diacritics/) by [David Březina](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002413/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/David%20Brezina)
author: filip blazek
